channel.title: Yue Zhao on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Yue Zhao on The AI Talks

item.title: Distilling Vision-Language Models on Millions of Videos
item.description: Speaker Yue Zhao is a fourth-year PhD student at the University of Texas at Austin, supervised by Prof. Philipp Krähenbühl. He obtained his MPhil degree from the Multimedia Laboratory at the Chinese University of Hong Kong, supervised by Prof. Dahua Lin. More previously, he got his Bachelor’s degree from Tsinghua University. His current research interests are computer vision, particularly video analysis and understanding. He is a recipient of the 2024-2025 NVIDIA fellowship.
